valueString: NEGATIVE <1:10 BY IFA.  INTERPRETATION: RESULTS INDICATIVE OF PAST EBV INFECTION.  In most populations, 90% of adults have been infected at sometime with EBV and will have measurable VCA IgG and EBNA antibodies. Antibodies to EBNA develop 6-8 weeks after primary infection and remain present for life. Presence of VCA IgM antibodies indicates recent primary infection.
